title: nammi vachchina
sahitya:
nammi vaccina nannu nayamugAnu brOvavE ninu



anupallavi



 kommani varamula nosagu kOvUri sundarEshvara



caraNam



 vEda purANAgama shAstrAdulu gumigUDi pAdamulanu gana jAlaka batimAli vEda nAdarUpa

shrI saundarya nAyakIpatE bhEda vAdA rahita shrI tyAgarAja varada sundarEshvara ninu
